attributes.additional_details:
I want to Government to combine similar e-petitions and combine the vote numbers and NOT just delete them.

I see that there are many e-petitions that are similar:

http://epetitions.direct.gov.uk/petitions/7337 - Rioters to lose benefits
http://epetitions.direct.gov.uk/petitions/8195
http://epetitions.direct.gov.uk/petitions/8427
http://epetitions.direct.gov.uk/petitions/9173

http://epetitions.direct.gov.uk/petitions/1785 - Sharia Law
http://epetitions.direct.gov.uk/petitions/1178

This e-petition even has a twin!
http://epetitions.direct.gov.uk/petitions/2098
